did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Video documentation of installations that formed part of the Machine Life exhibit curated by Jan Allen at the Agnes Etherington Art Centre. Includes a print catalog of the exhibit and program notes for the symposium.

bioghist.p: The Art, Automata & Us Symposium was held at the Agnes Etherington Art Centre, Queen's University, Kingston, Ontario, from February 6-7, 2004. The exhibit "Machine life" was on display in conjunction with the symposium and a lecture.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Video documentation of installations that formed part of the Machine Life exhibit curated by Jan Allen at the Agnes Etherington Art Centre, Queen's University, Kingston, Ontario, Canada, 6-7 February 2004. Includes a print catalog of the exhibit and program notes for the symposium, including biographies of the speakers.

controlaccess.head: Names:
controlaccess.corpname: Rose Goldsen Archive of New Media Art.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use:
userestrict.p: Digital files may not be copied or downloaded without the permission of the Curator and artist(s).

phystech.head: Physical Characteristics and Technical Requirements:
phystech.p: System requirements for disk (CD): Mac or PC.
